languages.text: "Воистину так. Ее верные слуги уже собрали исповедальные патрули, которые приглашают жителей станции покаяться в своих многочисленных преступлениях. Видит Император, у его набожных помощников много работы на Футфоле. Ибо грех, как пустота — неизмерим и рождается повсюду. Но разве это повод не пытаться покорить его?"

"Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"
languages.original_text: "Воистину так. Ее верные слуги уже собрали исповедальные патрули, которые приглашают жителей станции покаяться в своих многочисленных преступлениях. Видит Император, у его набожных помощников много работы на Футфоле. Ибо грех, как пустота — неизмерим и рождается повсюду. Но разве это повод не пытаться покорить его?"

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many sins and crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For sin, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that reason enough not to try and conquer it?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many sins and crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For sin, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that reason enough not to try and conquer it?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For sin, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For sin, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “确实如此。她忠诚的仆人已经成立了忏悔小组，负责在星站周围巡逻，邀请居民忏悔他们的恶行。在帝皇的见证下，祂虔诚的仆人们在落脚港恐怕有很多工作要做。因为罪恶就像虚空一样，它无处不在、不可估量。不过，这又何尝不是试着战胜它的理由呢？”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: “确实如此。她忠诚的仆人已经成立了忏悔小组，负责在星站周围巡逻，邀请居民忏悔他们的罪孽与恶行。在帝皇的见证下，祂虔诚的仆人们在落脚港恐怕有很多工作要做。因为罪恶就像虚空一样，它无处不在、不可估量。不过，这又何尝不是试着战胜它的理由呢？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Correcto. Sus leales sirvientes ya se han encargado de nombrar unidades confesionales para que patrullen la estación y animen a sus habitantes a que se arrepientan de sus delitos. Con el Emperador como testigo, Sus devotos ayudantes se enfrentan a una tarda ardua en Paso. Cierto es que la depravación, de la misma forma que el vacío, es inconmensurable y omnipresente. Pero ¿acaso son esos motivos suficientes para no intentar conquistarlo?».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: «Correcto. Sus leales sirvientes ya se han encargado de nombrar unidades confesionales para que patrullen la estación y animen a sus habitantes a que se arrepientan de sus pecados y delitos. Con el Emperador como testigo, Sus devotos ayudantes se enfrentan a una tarda ardua en Paso. Cierto es que el pecado, de la misma forma que el vacío, es inconmensurable y omnipresente. Pero ¿acaso son esos motivos suficientes para no intentar conquistarlo?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「はい。彼女の忠実な従者たちはすでに懺悔部隊を任命しており、ステーションを巡回し、住民に多くの罪を悔い改めるよう呼びかけることを任務としています。皇帝が私の証人であるように、彼の敬虔な側近たちはフットフォールでの仕事に精を出しています。堕落は虚空と同様に計り知れず、あらゆる場所に存在します。しかし、だからといって克服しようとしない理由がないでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: 「はい。彼女の忠実な従者たちはすでに懺悔部隊を任命しており、ステーションを巡回し、住民に多くの罪を悔い改めるよう呼びかけることを任務としています。皇帝が私の証人であるように、彼の敬虔な側近たちはフットフォールでの仕事に精を出しています。罪は虚空と同様に計り知れず、あらゆる場所に存在します。しかし、だからといって克服しようとしない理由がないでしょう？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "In der Tat. Ihre treuen Diener haben bereits Beichteinheiten ernannt, die in der Station patrouillieren und ihre Bewohner einladen, ihre zahlreichen Verbrechen zu bereuen. Der Imperator ist mein Zeuge, seine frommen Helfer werden hier auf Footfall reichlich Arbeit haben. Denn die Sittenlosigkeit ist wie die Leere unermesslich und omnipräsent. Aber ist das ein Grund, nicht zu versuchen, ihr Einhalt zu gebieten?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Ihre treuen Diener haben bereits Beichteinheiten ernannt, die in der Station patrouillieren und ihre Bewohner einladen, ihre zahlreichen Sünden und Verbrechen zu bereuen. Der Imperator ist mein Zeuge, seine frommen Helfer werden hier auf Footfall reichlich Arbeit haben. Denn die Sünde ist wie die Leere unermesslich und omnipräsent. Aber ist das ein Grund, nicht zu versuchen, ihr Einhalt zu gebieten?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « En effet. Ses fidèles serviteurs ont déjà chargé des unités de confession de patrouiller dans la station et d'inviter ses habitants à se repentir de leurs nombreux crimes. Que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin, Ses pieux assistants ne risquent pas de chômer à Castel. La dépravation y est incommensurable et omniprésente, à l'instar du néant. Mais est-ce une raison suffisante pour ne pas chercher à en faire la conquête ? »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Ses fidèles serviteurs ont déjà chargé des unités de confession de patrouiller dans la station et d'inviter ses habitants à se repentir de leurs nombreux crimes et péchés. Que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin, Ses pieux assistants ne risquent pas de chômer à Castel. Les péchés y sont incommensurables et omniprésents, à l'instar du néant. Mais est-ce une raison suffisante pour ne pas chercher à en faire la conquête ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Öyle. Sadık hizmetkârları, günah çıkarma birimlerinin atamalarını yaptılar bile. Görevleri, istasyonda devriye gezip insanları suçlarından ötürü tövbeye davet etmek. İmparator şahidim olsun ki inançlı emir erleri, tam da Binliman'ın ihtiyacı olan şeylerdi. Ahlaksızlık tıpkı uçsuz gibidir, ölçülemez ve her daim mevcuttur. Peki bu, onun üstesinden gelmeye çalışmamak için geçerli bir sebep midir?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Her loyal servants have already appointed confessional units whose duty it is to patrol the station and invite its denizens to repent of their many crimes. As the Emperor is my witness, His pious aides have their work cut out for them on Footfall. For depravity, much like the void, is immeasurable and omnipresent. But is that any reason not to try and conquer it?"

traits.locale_text: "Öyle. Sadık hizmetkârları günah çıkarma birimlerinin atamalarını yaptılar bile. Görevleri istasyonda devriye gezmek ve insanları suçlarından ötürü tövbe etmeye davet etmek. İmparator şahidim olsun ki inançlı emir erleri tam da Binliman'ın ihtiyacı olan şeylerdi. Ahlaksızlık tıpkı uçsuz gibidir, ölçülemezdir ve her daim mevcuttur ama bu, onun üstesinden gelmeye çalışmamak için geçerli bir sebep mi?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
